metadata.name: chad 1
metadata.description:
For Fortune Magazine’s 2021 August/September issue focused on cryptocurrency and defi, I was honored with the unique opportunity to design the magazine’s cover and dedicate this to the crypto twitter community which has given so much to me. Fortune and I will be donating 50% of the proceeds to charity.

For the auction, we’re collaborating with Manifold to create custom smart contracts specifically for this drop. How will it work?

This NFT is coded to react to a certain list of buyer ETH addresses during its inaugural auction. If a bid comes from one of the buyer’s ETH addresses in this list, the NFT will update to a special edition artwork designed specifically for the target buyer. However, if the bid is outbid by a non-targeted bidder, then the NFT reverts to its original artwork.
